name: Iron-on Elbow Patches -Brown & Black Plaid Wool - Limited Edition!
description:
What happens when you love your sweater or jacket so much that it wears a hole in the elbow? You save it by ironing on TWEEDMENDS™ elbow patches!  

Mix and match your  patterns or just add them to a solid sweater or jacket - either way, TWEEDMENDS™ are a fresh way to update your wardrobe! 

 Our unique iron-on patches are made of 100% recycled tweeds and wools that are an elegant, soft rectangular shape.   This pair of patches is made with a classic english brown and black plaid smooth wool.

2 patches are included.   4 1/2" x 2".   Super easy to iron-on wool jackets, wool knits, including cashmere!
  
These wool patches are a limited edition.     Sourced and handmade in fabulous Los Angeles!

name: Iron-on Cashmere Moths - Cream
description:
Don't you hate it when moths nibble on your favorite sweater?! 
Drag that nibbled on knit right out of the Goodwill pile and transform it into a fresh new design with Cashmends™!    Great for small cover-ups or creating a whole new design - spruce up a scarf, hat, or blanket.... sky's the limit!  

Our ironic moth patches are easy to iron-on!
 -No sewing necessary!

3 moths per package:  
 - 1 moth  - 4 1/2" wide
 - 2 moths - 3 1/4" wide 

**100% handmade in fabulous Los Angeles!

Special note - Cashmends™ are cut from recycled cashmere sweaters;  therefore they will vary slightly in color from the images shown.

name: Iron-on Cashmere Leaves - Early Autumn
description:
Don't you hate it when moths nibble on your favorite sweater?! 
Drag that nibbled on knit right out of the Goodwill pile and transform it into a fresh new design with Cashmends™!    Great for small cover-ups or creating a whole new design - spruce up a scarf, hat, or blanket.... sky's the limit!  

Our beautiful autumn patches are easy to iron-on!
 -No sewing necessary!

These beautiful designs were hand drawn in 1919 by Abraham Snyder when he was a student at Pennsylvania Forestry School in Mt. Alto, PA.  These drawings were from his botany class notes, preserved by his granddaughter, Annie, who we thank so much for sharing Abe's talents with us!

2 leaves and 1 acorn per package:
   -1 Silver Maple Leaf - 3 1/2" wide
   -1 Rock Oak Leaf  - 3" long
   -1 Red Oak Acorn - 1 1/4" wide

**100% handmade in fabulous Los Angeles!

Special note - Cashmends™ are cut from recycled cashmere sweaters; therefore they will vary slightly in color from the images shown.

Drag that nibbled on knit right out of the Goodwill pile and transform it into a fresh new design with Cashmends™!    Great for small cover-ups or creating a whole new design - spruce up a scarf, hat, or blanket.... sky's the limit!  

Our flower power patches are easy to iron-on!
 -No sewing necessary!

3 flowers per package:  
 1 flower - 3 1/4" wide
 1 flower - 2 3/4" wide
 1 flower - 2 1/8" wide

**100% handmade in fabulous Los Angeles!

Special note - Cashmends™ are cut from recycled cashmere sweaters; therefore they will vary slightly in color from the images shown.

name: "Basil" Womens Cashmere Sweater
description:
"Basil" the British bulldog is 100% upcycled cashmere. The sweater is a casual smart fit that flatters all body shapes. The length is nice and long and hits just below the belt line of your favorite jeans for a clean modern look. The waist is slightly fitted for a stylish feminine silhouette. Sourced, designed, sewn, and hand screen printed in fabulous Los Angeles!! ** A SPECIAL NOTE ** Our sweaters are created from larger recycled cashmere sweaters and results in each piece being unique; therefore they will vary slightly in shape and color from the images shown.

name: The Bella Moth Sweater - Oat Heather
description:
No one likes to see a beautiful cashmere sweater go to waste! This sweater had been snacked on by a pesky moth so we came up with the most original way to reclaim it! Our moth appliques are hand screen printed on recycled cashmere, hand cut, then intricately hand sewn over the moth hole! The end result is a unique and witty design that will command the attention of all your "green" fashion friends! Sourced, designed, sewn, and hand screen printed in fabulous Los Angeles!! ** A SPECIAL NOTE ** Our sweaters are created from larger recycled cashmere sweaters and results in each piece being unique; therefore they will vary slightly in shape and color from the images shown - and because each moth snacks on sweaters in their own annoying way, the placement of the moths may vary from sweater to sweater.

name: Iron-On Cashmere Elbow Patches - CREAM
description:
What happens when you love your sweater so much that it wears a hole in the elbow?   You save it by ironing on a Cashmends™ elbow pad!

Our unique iron-on patches are made of 100% recycled cashmere and are an elegant, soft rectangular shape. 

  Your sweater doesn't have to be cashmere -  our patches can be ironed onto wool, silk, cotton... any knit that can be ironed at the "wool" setting -   No sewing necessary!

2 patches included - This design comes in two different sizes 
 - please choose your size accordingly

 The medium size is for the average woman's size sweater -
   4" x 1 3/4".  

The large size is for the average man's sweater -
 4 1/2" x 2" 

 Sourced and handmade in fabulous Los Angeles!
